comments: Got my first B ever. He was awful. Very unhelpful. Do not take as a summer class with him. When I asked for help on an exam he just told to go back and sit down and think about it some more. I wasn\'t even asking for the answer, just direction. Completely unwilling to help his students with their concerns. Run away, fast!

I took this class on Saturday mornhings!!! It was hard to get up and get there but the class was not hard and Dr.Kelly gives great lectures. He brings in all these gadgets to better demonstrate. He is sweet and funny and I hope he teaches longer (even though he\'s in his 60\'s)

he\'s a good teacher but he DOES NOT HELP THE STUDENTS he know what he\'s talking about but when he gives out the notes he talks at the same time explaining and he rushes through with the notes. its HARD! and very confusing

For those who like physics or ones who want a good grade, Dr. Kelly is a great professor. He has a good sense of humor and has a very structured class environment. You know when things are due and when test will be and what will be on them. It was very enjoyable and I would take any class he teaches. Tip for those who do. DO THE READINGS.

Very good professor. Very clear and doesn\'t expect too much from you as long as you show up. The class is pretty easy (he realizes that the class, for most, is a university requirement), as long as you\'re not stupid.
